content:
Exporter/Importer Journey – Line Flowchart
Start
  ↓
IEC (Import Export Code) Registration
  ↓
EPC Registration (Export Promotion Councils – CHEMEXCIL, AEPC, EEPC, SEPC)
  ↓
Export House Certificate (if eligible)
  ↓
Policy & Regulatory Compliance (DGFT, Customs, FEMA, RBI)
  ↓
Scheme Selection:
   ├─ Advance Authorisation → SION / Ad-hoc Norms
   ├─ EPCG → Post-EPCG Obligations
   ├─ SEIS / RoDTEP / ROSCTL / Duty Drawback
   └─ Warehousing / Deemed Export / IGST Refunds
  ↓
Specialised Units Formation (EOU / STPI / SEZ / BTP / EHTP)
  ↓
Risk & Compliance:
   ├─ AEO (Authorized Economic Operator)
   ├─ RMS (Risk Management System)
   ├─ SIMS (Steel Import Monitoring System)
   └─ PRC (Policy Relaxation Committee cases, if any)
  ↓
Export Incentive Monetisation:
   ├─ RoDTEP/ROSCTL Scrips – Sale/Purchase
   └─ Duty Credit Scrips Utilisation
  ↓
Ongoing Foreign Trade Consulting & Policy Advisory
  ↓
Growth & Scaling to New Geographies
